com.azure.core.amqp

Class ExponentialRetry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.core.amqp.Retry
      • com.azure.core.amqp.ExponentialRetry

  • public final class ExponentialRetry
extends Retry
    A policy to govern retrying of messaging operations in which the delay between retries will grow in an exponential manner, allowing more time to recover as the number of retries increases.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.azure.core.amqp.Retry

        DEFAULT_MAX_RETRY_COUNT, DEFAULT_RETRY_MAX_BACKOFF, DEFAULT_RETRY_MIN_BACKOFF

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExponentialRetry(Duration minBackoff, Duration maxBackoff, int maxRetryCount)
      Creates a new instance with a minimum and maximum retry period in addition to maximum number of retry attempts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Duration calculateNextRetryInterval(Exception lastException, Duration remainingTime, int baseWaitSeconds, int retryCount)
      Allows a concrete retry policy implementation to offer a base retry interval to be used in the calculations performed by 'Retry.GetNextRetryInterval'.

      • Methods inherited from class com.azure.core.amqp.Retry

        getDefaultRetry, getMaxRetryCount, getNextRetryInterval, getNoRetry, getRetryCount, incrementRetryCount, isRetriableException, resetRetryInterval

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExponentialRetry

        public ExponentialRetry(Duration minBackoff,
                        Duration maxBackoff,
                        int maxRetryCount)
        Creates a new instance with a minimum and maximum retry period in addition to maximum number of retry attempts.
        Parameters:
        minBackoff - The minimum time period permissible for backing off between retries.
        maxBackoff - The maximum time period permissible for backing off between retries.
        maxRetryCount - The maximum number of retries allowed.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateNextRetryInterval

        protected Duration calculateNextRetryInterval(Exception lastException,
                                              Duration remainingTime,
                                              int baseWaitSeconds,
                                              int retryCount)
        Allows a concrete retry policy implementation to offer a base retry interval to be used in the calculations performed by 'Retry.GetNextRetryInterval'.
        Specified by:
        calculateNextRetryInterval in class Retry
        Parameters:
        lastException - The last exception that was observed for the operation to be retried.
        remainingTime - The amount of time remaining for the cumulative timeout across retry attempts.
        baseWaitSeconds - The number of seconds to base the suggested retry interval on; this should be used as the minimum interval returned under normal circumstances.
        retryCount - The number of retries that have already been attempted.
        Returns:
        The amount of time to delay before retrying the associated operation; if null, then the operation is no longer eligible to be retried.
